name: Harper Lee
biography: An American novelist best known for 'To Kill a Mockingbird'.

name: George Orwell
biography: An English novelist and essayist, journalist, and critic, known for '1984' and 'Animal Farm'.

name: F. Scott Fitzgerald
biography: An American novelist and short story writer, famous for 'The Great Gatsby'.

name: Herman Melville
biography: An American novelist and poet, best known for 'Moby Dick'.

name: Jane Austen
biography: An English novelist known for her six major novels including 'Pride and Prejudice'.

name: J.D. Salinger
biography: An American writer known for 'The Catcher in the Rye'.

biography: An English novelist and poet, known for 'Jane Eyre'.

name: Leo Tolstoy
biography: A Russian writer, best known for 'War and Peace' and 'Anna Karenina'.

name: J.R.R. Tolkien
biography: An English writer and professor, known for 'The Hobbit' and 'The Lord of the Rings'.

name: Mark Twain
biography: An American writer and humorist, known for 'Adventures of Huckleberry Finn' and 'The Adventures of Tom Sawyer'.
